meanings.definition: A system for encrypting and decrypting information.
meanings.sent1: Cryptosystems are used to keep sensitive data safe from hackers.
meanings.sent2: I learned about cryptosystems in my computer science class.
meanings.sent3: The cryptosystems at the bank work hard to protect our money.
meanings.sent4: In the digital age, cryptosystems act as invisible shields for our online transactions.
meanings.sent5: Understanding cryptosystems is essential for maintaining privacy in the digital world.

meanings.definition: The study of methods for secure communication.
meanings.sent1: Researchers in cryptosystems focus on developing new ways to keep information secure.
meanings.sent2: Cryptosystems play a crucial role in safeguarding sensitive conversations.
meanings.sent3: The cryptosystems class is always full of students eager to learn about encryption.
meanings.sent4: In the world of espionage, cryptosystems are the key to keeping secrets hidden.
meanings.sent5: Mastering cryptosystems requires a deep understanding of encryption techniques.
